# File lib/ramaze/view/tenjin.rb, line 6
      def self.call(action, string)
        tenjin = View.compile(string){|s|
          template = ::Tenjin::Template.new
          template.convert(s)
          template
        }

        html = tenjin.ramaze_render(action.binding)

        return html, 'text/html'
      end
